item.title: MIUI OS1.0.9.0.UKAMIXM Fastboot update for Mi 11 Ultra Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 11 Ultra Global

Codename: star

Version: OS1.0.9.0.UKAMIXM | 14.0

Size: 6.3 GB

MD5: 391b8bbb763e9298d6c7eb9e75d0e613

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: New startup animation strategy makes apps launch faster
Updated the security patch to November 2024. Increased system security.
[Notes]
Fix: Multiple search bars appeared when opening Tasks from a widget
Fix: Notifications about successfully created tasks didn't disappear after being tapped
[Clock]
Fix: When setting alarm repetition, the checkbox was displayed abnormally when switching to Dark mode

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V13.0.10.0.SKACNXM Recovery update for Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China

Codename: star

Version: V13.0.10.0.SKACNXM | 12.0

Size: 4.6 GB

MD5: ccc25df1dc51a9964a6598246f3dd1d7

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Issues with the search bar while switching from landscape to portrait orientation
Fix: Carrier names weren't displayed correctly after being edited
Fix: Amap and other similar apps turned off portable hotspot
Fix: Multiple popups appeared while some Bluetooth earphones were being connected
Fix: Problems with NetEase Music lyrics
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2022. Increased system security.

Download: Here
